thread.title: 34 Pieces Of Jewelry That Won't Break The Bank
thread.title_full: 34 Pieces Of Jewelry That Won't Break The Bank

author: Elena Garcia
title: 34 Pieces Of Jewelry That Won't Break The Bank
text:
View this image ›
Jenny Chang / BuzzFeed We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales from the links on this page.
ID: 10273696 1. These adorable earrings that are made of puuurls . View this image ›
amazon.com Get them on Amazon for $11 .
ID: 10268429 2. This necklace because look at it, isn’t it neat? Wouldn’t your collection be complete? View this image ›
etsy.com Get it from Gerizim on Etsy for $16 .
ID: 10268169 3. This set of delicate rings that you can stack or wear individually. View this image ›
forever21.com Get them at Forever 21 for $4 .
Available in sizes 6, 7, and 8.
ID: 10268367 4. These earrings that are the perfect pop of color on a dreary winter day. View this image ›
shop.mango.com Get them at Mango for $16 .
ID: 10268385 5. This necklace that just wants you to hang in there. amazon.com Get it on Amazon for $24 .
ID: 10268476 6. This brooch set that’ll be perfect for when you do that double kiss, cool girl greeting. baublebar.com Get them at Bauble Bar for $16 .
ID: 10268182 7. This bracelet that’s so cute you could just eat it up. etsy.com Get it at From J Design on Etsy for $13 .
ID: 10268349 8. These earrings that just do not give a f#@%. View this image ›
amazon.com Get them on Amazon for $4 .
ID: 10268232 9. These earrings that are absolute perfection and we can not wait to add them to our shopping cart. forever21.com They’re already there… We couldn’t wait!
Get them at Forever 21 for $7 .
ID: 10268311 10. This gentle little bracelet that’ll give you that something blue. us.asos.com Get it on Asos for $10 .
ID: 10268593 11. This choker that is a dainty rainbow of perfection. forever21.com Get it at Forever 21 for $6 .
ID: 10268323 12. This bracelet that costs a little extra but you already knew it would. View this image ›
etsy.com Get it from Rockaway Gypsea on Etsy starting at $20 .
Available in copper or brass and with lowercase or uppercase lettering.
ID: 10268437 13. These earrings that remind us a little bit of Sailor Moon — and we love them for it. amazon.com Get them on Amazon for $7 .
ID: 10268226 14. This necklace that you’ll never forget to put on. amazon.com Get it on Amazon for $11 .
Available in gold, rose gold, and silver.
ID: 10268431 15. These earrings that are earthy but also very chic. shop.mango.com Get them at Mango for $10 .
The matching necklace is also available for $20 .
ID: 10268533 16. These earrings that are worth all the tassel. View this image ›
hm.com Get them at H&M for $7 .
ID: 10268091 17. This ring that’s adjustable to fit nearly every finger. baublebar.com Get it at Bauble Bar for $18 .
Also available in Amazonite.
ID: 10268195 18. This delicate hand chain that’ll have you covered from your finger to your wrist. View this image ›
etsy.com Get it from Avra Jewelry on Etsy starting at $25 .
Available in sterling silver or gold and in 6”, 6.5”, and 7” sizes.
ID: 10268214 19. This statement necklace that’ll have you sparkling all over town. amazon.com Get it on Amazon for $16 .
Available with white or black settings.
ID: 10268478 20. These earrings you can put on when you have nothing to wear and just decide, screw it! View this image ›
amazon.com Get the set of three for $10 or each individually for $8.
ID: 10268434 21. This ring that’ll give your finger its own version of a flower crown. us.asos.com Get it at Asos for $13 .
ID: 10268625 22. This choker that’ll add just enough sparkle to your outfit. forever21.com Get it at Forever 21 for $11 .
ID: 10268301 23. These earrings that you can customize to whatever color combination your heart desires. etsy.com Get them from Eat Da Rich on Etsy for $20 .
Available in a wide variety of color combinations.
ID: 10268613 24. This set of casual bracelets that communicate all our hunger pangs. View this image ›
forever21.com Get the set at Forever 21 for $7.
ID: 10268361 25. These rings that are covered with velvety richness. forever21.com Get them at Forever 21 for $5 .
Available in S/M and M/L.
ID: 10268333 26. These earrings that are handmade to absolute perfection. View this image ›
etsy.com Get them from Biulu Artisan Boutique on Etsy for $23 .
ID: 10268154 27. This necklace that’ll give you all the flower power you need. View this image ›
shop.mango.com Get it from Mango for $13 .
ID: 10268412 28. This bracelet that’ll have you wearing your lucky charms on your sleeve. View this image ›
hm.com Get it at H&M for $10 .
Available in S/M and M/L.
ID: 10268088 29. This subtle statement necklace that’s 3D and delightful. View this image ›
torrid.com Get it at Torrid for $23 .
ID: 10268485 30. These statement earrings that’ll add just enough flare to your outfit. View this image ›
hm.com Get them at H&M for $25 .
ID: 10268065 31. This statement ring that isn’t catty at all. View this image ›
hm.com Get it at H&M for $10 .
Available in S/M and M/L.
ID: 10268090 32. This cuff that could potentially keep your wrist warm this winter. shop.mango.com Get it at Mango for $13 .
ID: 10268396 33. These earrings that are filled with confetti, making them a party for your ears. forever21.com Get them at Forever 21 for $5 .
ID: 10268526 34. And this choker that’s a little glitter and a lot of style. View this image ›
hm.com Get it at H&M for $4 .
ID: 10268082 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
